text:
Page Titles for System Pages?!?!
--------------------------------------

In the HubSpot theme boilerplate it shows that we set the page title from the base.html file using this variable.

```<title>{{ page_meta.html_title }}</title>```
However, 404, 500, search results, and other system pages don't render a page title. It's blank.  Does anyone know how to set this or is this a simple oversite/bug on the HubSpot side?
